siteId.title: Your Shareaholic Site ID
siteId.description: Enter the Site ID provided to you in your Shareaholic Sites Dashboard. If you already have a Shareaholic account, please log in and we will present a list of your sites here for you to choose from. If not, please sign up and we will setup your site during the installation process.

setup.helpvalue: Once you've linked your Cloudflare account with Shareaholic, head on over to your Shareaholic Sites Dashboard to configure your settings.
